title: Tempeh & Spinach Stew
method: Prep: finely chop the spinach and slice the mushrooms.
Preheat oven to 150°C.
Toss tempeh with oil, salt, pepper and spices; spread on a tray with veg.
Slow-roast for 27–33 minutes until tempeh is cooked through (75°C internal for poultry).
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve tempeh neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped tarragon, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Basque presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.

title: Brazilian Inspired Firm Tofu Bowls
method: Prep: finely chop the peppers and slice the broccoli.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat.
Stir-fry firm tofu 5–6 min; add veg and sauce; cook 3–4 min more.
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve firm tofu neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped parsley, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Brazilian presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.

title: Aubergine & Cottage Cheese Skewers
method: Prep: finely chop the aubergine and slice the tomatoes.
Bring a shallow pan of seasoned liquid to a bare simmer.
Poach cottage cheese 8–12 min until opaque and flaky.
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve cottage cheese neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped basil, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Sri Lankan presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.

title: Turkey Breast & Aubergine Bowl
